p: Six trials [7], [14], [16], [17], [19], [27] reported the effect of Chinese herbs individually or in combination with oseltamivir on hospital stay. Among them, two trials demonstrated better effect favoring Chinese herbs: one herbal formula showed shorter hospital stay compared to oseltamivir [17], and Tanreqing Injection combined with oseltamivir had shorter hospital stay compared to oseltamivir alone [19].
